  Attach to a Claude coding session for interactive communication.                                                      
                                                                                                                        
  Examples:                                                                                                             
    claude-pilot attach my-project         # Attach to session named "my-project" (deprecated)                         
    claude-pilot attach --id my-project    # Attach to session by ID                                                    
    claude-pilot attach --id abc123        # Attach to session by specific ID                                           
         
  USAGE  
         
    claude-pilot attach [session-name-or-id] [--flags]  
         
  FLAGS  
         
    --config      Config file (default is $HOME/.config/claude-pilot/claude-pilot.yaml)
    --debug       Enable debug logging (overrides --verbose)
    -h --help     Help for attach
    --id          Session ID/name to attach to (alternative to positional argument)
    --no-color    Disable ANSI colors in output
    -o --output   Output format (human|table|json|ndjson|quiet) (human)
    --trace       Enable trace logging (overrides --debug and --verbose)
    -v --verbose  Verbose output
    --yes         Accept defaults for prompts (non-interactive mode)
